data.message: Please help me you as you have facebook why you dont give the verified page to the kurdish? I have a page and i want to get the verified page ....thanks for help me :(

replies.message: Hey Mustafa. If you're an admin of a local business Page, you may be eligible for a gray verification badge, which you'll see in your Page's settings. Learn more: http://bit.ly/1S7AOlV. If your Page represents a celebrity, public figure, sports team, media or entertainment, you may be eligible for a blue verification badge. To see if your Page is eligible, please fill out this form: http://bit.ly/1UYCqlI. -Kate
